chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, punctual as ever, croaked, "Chirp, chirp! 10 PM! 💊 Time, Penelope!" Penelope the chick 🐥, engrossed in seed-sorting 🫘, chirped back, "Just a sec, Ferdinand!" Secs turned to hours. Ferdinand snoozed. Penelope, bursting with energy at 3 AM 🕺, realized: no medicine! 😱 She zoomed around, chirping maniacally. Ferdinand, bleary-eyed, muttered, "Next time, I'm hiding the seeds." 😴
